publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3400# Mr John McAllion: Whitfield-That the Parliament congratulates the people of Whitfield in Dundee for their outstanding efforts in regenerating their community over the last few years; notes that Whitfield, like many other parts of Scotland, has its fair share of problems but recognises the great progress made by community-based organisations; however, further notes the Save the Children report, The Well-being of Children in the UK, that highlights the persistence of poverty and other problems in parts of the estate; regrets that the Whitfield Partnership was wound up by the Scotland Office without a proper exit strategy, and believes that the Scottish Executive and Her Majesty's Government should redouble their efforts to eradicate child poverty from Whitfield and every other community in Scotland.
S1M-3400# Whitfield (lodged on 17 September 2002) Alex Neil*
S1M-3400# Whitfield (lodged on 17 September 2002) Kate Maclean*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Scott Barrie*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3400# Mr John McAllion: Whitfield-That the Parliament congratulates the people of Whitfield in Dundee for their outstanding efforts in regenerating their community over the last few years; notes that Whitfield, like many other parts of Scotland, has its fair share of problems but recognises the great progress made by community-based organisations; however, further notes the Save the Children report, The Well-being of Children in the UK, that highlights the persistence of poverty and other problems in parts of the estate; regrets that the Whitfield Partnership was wound up by the Scotland Office without a proper exit strategy, and believes that the Scottish Executive and Her Majesty's Government should redouble their efforts to eradicate child poverty from Whitfield and every other community in Scotland. Supported by: Alex Neil, Kate Maclean, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Scott Barrie, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Elaine Smith*
S1M-3400# Whitfield (lodged on 17 September 2002) Brian Adam*, Irene McGugan*, Stewart Stevenson*, Cathy Peattie*
S1M-3400# Whitfield (lodged on 17 September 2002) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-3400# Whitfield (lodged on 17 September 2002) Shona Robison*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3400# Whitfield (lodged on 17 September 2002) Helen Eadie*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3400# Whitfield (lodged on 17 September 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Robin Harper*
